Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or sources provided to verify that Carl Sagan actually said the quote.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote is attributed to Carl Sagan without providing sufficient evidence or sources to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The quote is attributed to Carl Sagan, but there is an alternative explanation that it was actually from fantasy author P.C. Hodgell's novel.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the quote attributed to Carl Sagan did not appear until mid-2013, while Hodgell's novel containing a similar phrase was published in 1994.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting conflicting information about the origin of the quote and its attribution to Carl Sagan.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the influence and popularity of the quote by stating that it regularly showed up on share-centric social media sites without providing concrete evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
